final_answer:
The humor in this image comes from its satirical take on human behavior regarding littering. The left side simply shows a trash can icon, representing the straightforward idea of properly disposing trash. The right side humorously contrasts this with a scene where a hand is about to drop a candy wrapper through a railing, which is not a trash can. 

The text "YES, BUT" suggests an awareness of the correct behavior (using a trash can) but then humorously highlights the contradictory or lazy action of littering instead. This satirical illustration pokes fun at the discrepancy between knowing the right thing to do and actually doing it.
